text:
@mattgaetz Fearmongering much? Some fever dream from when you were drunk? Strange that none of these things happened during the Obama/Biden administration. 
And here we are:
128,000+ dead from #COVID19 due to catastrophic mismanagement. 
Unemployment @ 13%+
Civil unrest. 
ON YOUR WATCH!
